scripts.klickbait:init: npm install && cd vue/app && npm install && cd ../../common && npm install && cd ../core && npm install
scripts.klickbait:dev: concurrently --kill-others "node installer.js" "http-server" "npm run dev --prefix vue/app" "npm run dev --prefix core" "npm run dev --prefix common"
scripts.klickbait:build: concurrently "npm run build --prefix core" "npm run build --prefix vue/app"
